üí∞ M√âTRICAS FINANCEIRAS

Receita e Crescimento

TABLE 
  title as "Projeto",
  budget as "Budget",
  kpi_primary as "KPI Principal",
  status as "Status"
FROM "4-Projetos"
WHERE status = "in-progress" OR status = "deployed"
SORT budget desc
